document_data.name: Kimmy Diallo
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kimmy Diallo''' was [[Monifa Diallo]]'s daughter from the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] district of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Mummy keeps talking about some "army," but she won't tell me anything about it! I'm not a baby.''|Monifa Diallo}}
document_data.Description: Kimmy looked a lot like her mother, she shared her dark skin, brown eyes, and curly brown har that framed her cherubic face.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the army assembled by the [[Cult of the Absolute]] moved from the [[Moonrise Towers]] in [[Chionthar Valley]] to menace the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], displacing countless refugees in the process along the way. Pressured by the refugee crisis, Baldur's Gate closed the [[Wyrm's Crossing]] bridge, separating Rivington from other parts of the metropolis and turning it into a refugee tent city. Monifa Diallo, Kimmy's mother, believed the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]] did not care for the looming danger and possible deaths of everyone in Rivington. However, she did not wish to scare Kimmy.
